formatted_display: English: Sunday, 08 February 2026 | Nepali: Sunday, 25 Magh 2082
quote: It doesn't matter if the glass is half empty or half full. Be grateful you have a glass - you're the only person that can decide what's in it.
formatted_quote: "It doesn't matter if the glass is half empty or half full. Be grateful you have a glass - you're the only person that can decide what's in it." - Gurbaksh Chahal
